title: Unfair leaver buster
body: I was playing ranked with some friends and then my game crashed, when I got back on we we're able to recover and still win but I got a leaver buster after the match. Can anything be done about this without having to clear the leaver buster? It's tiring clearing the leaver buster when I got one because of a game crash.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Getting punished for something out of your control can definitely feel pretty awful.  However, keep in mind that we never punish for leaving a single game.  From looking at your account, it appears that you had a consistent pattern of leaving games in the past, causing your Leaver Level to be extremely high.  Because it is so high, even leaving a single game will trigger penalties.  The best advice I can give is to simply play out the Lower Priority Queue games.  After playing enough games without leaving, your Leaver Level will eventually decrease and you won't get automatically punished.

Let me know if you have any further questions!
